phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Create CSS custom properties for Construction Navy and semantic colors

subtasks.description: Create design-tokens.css with Construction Navy palette and semantic color CSS variables

verification.run: Check browser DevTools :root for CSS variables

subtasks.notes: Created frontend/src/styles/design-tokens.css with 10 Construction Navy palette colors (--color-navy-50 through --color-navy-900) and 16 semantic color variables (success, warning, error, info with 4 variants each). All colors use hex format following naming convention --color-[category]-[shade]. Also imported the CSS file in main.tsx for global availability.

subtasks.description: Import design-tokens.css in main.tsx to make CSS variables globally available

verification.run: Verify no console errors on page load

subtasks.notes: Added import './styles/design-tokens.css' to frontend/src/main.tsx. CSS variables are now globally available. No console errors on import.

qa_signoff.summary: All spec requirements met. Clean implementation with no issues found. Ready for merge.
